MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Cell structure | d: Homeostasis

MCQ: What is the unit of organization in biology that is responsible for processing hereditary information?
Choices: a: Tissues | b: Organs | c: Cells | d: Organisms

MCQ: Which major process in biology allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Energy processing | d: Homeostasis

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 million years ago | b: 3.7 billion years ago | c: 10,000 years ago | d: 500 million years ago
